# select(_:)

**Instance Method**

Selects the specified menu item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func select(_ item: NSMenuItem?)
```

## Parameters

- **item**: The menu item to select, or `nil` if you want to deselect all menu items.

## Setting the current selection

- **selectItem(at:)**: Selects the item in the menu at the specified index.
- **selectItem(withTag:)**: Selects the menu item with the specified tag.
- **selectItem(withTitle:)**: Selects the item with the specified title.

items.description: Selects the item in the menu at the specified index.
items.name: selectItem(at:)

items.description: Selects the menu item with the specified tag.
items.name: selectItem(withTag:)

items.description: Selects the item with the specified title.
items.name: selectItem(withTitle:)

title: select(_:)
